name: GHOSTING VANDAL - DEMO
description:
-This is a demo of the Ghosting Vandal Project-

Counter attack the forces of the Bolfere Plague in the rol of Mozz, a hired combatant with the power of the Ghosting Guns!

Shoot, melee and roll your way through the enemy lines and defeat the Spectral Elite Soldiers possessing Ghosting Gear, a mystical type of weapons similar to yours but with different abilities.

The current demo has 1 playable level to experience the base gameplay; the full experience is currently being developed with 9 levels and bonus challenges, this may vary depending on the support of the community.

Recommended Specs:

Intel core i5, 8GB of RAM, 2GB GPU. 100MB free space.

//Currently runs only in Windows//

Please submit any bug reports or performance issues to: jdaltaire@gmail.com
